content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseDelimitedTextFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT ,
	       FORMAT_OPTIONS (
			 FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
			 USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE,
			 FIRST_ROW = 2 
			))
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'bronze_bigpharma_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [bronze_bigpharma_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://bronze@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE test2 (
	test1 nvarchar(4000),
	test2 nvarchar(4000)
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Test/test.csv',
	DATA_SOURCE = [bronze_bigpharma_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseDelimitedTextFormat]
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT ParquetFileFormat
    WITH (FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE test_as_select WITH (
	LOCATION = '/Test/test',
	DATA_SOURCE = [bronze_bigpharma_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = ParquetFileFormat
	) 
as
SELECT TOP 100 * FROM test2


drop EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [bronze_bigpharma_dfs_core_windows_net] 


insert into test_as_select select *From test2


drop  EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT ParquetFileFormat
